item.title: Near the centre of the road, 19th February
item.description:
Just past the bus stop coming from Charlton kings in the middle of the road. Really deep and has actually punched my tyre when I didn't see it late last night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 massive pot holes, 19th February
item.description:
2 massive pot holes on the corner of harp hill. Due to on coming traffic I was unable to swerve causing my tire to get stredded and my car to be recovered . Much bigger then the guide lines off “tennis ball”

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harp Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 19th February
item.description:
Customer was in this area around lunchtime and his racer bike wheels has gone into the drain gap and this trapped and diverted his wheel and he lost control. They fell off and hit a van with his shoulder. They would like to raise this concern as this a busy cycle route and thinner tyres may get jammed and lead loss of control and injury.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain is consistently blocked, even when reports have been closed., 19th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
